name: Offroad Moto X Drift Racing – Bike Stunt Simulator
name_original: Offroad Moto X Drift Racing – Bike Stunt Simulator
description:
Shift into top gear to dive in the world of real moto cross stunt bike racing. Drive your moto X bike across the ultimate challenges and dangers to perform jaw dropping stunts with impeccable driving and balancing skills. If you are a real racer, you’ll walk out of this alive!


This offroad moto x drift racing simulator lets you drive your favorite stunt bikes on challenging tracks and deadly environments, keeping your balance on steep tracks and turns, or fall and wreck your moto cross bike to pieces. Balance and speed is what you need to take care of at all times, playing in numerous challenges spread in over 10 amazing and high quality environments. If you can clear the challenges in one go, you will be crowned the next Moto X Drift Racing champion.


GAMEPLAY FEATURES

Simple but realistic bike driving controls

Choose from 10 different tracks, with each track offering unique challenges to counter

High quality and detailed environments and gameplay graphics

Super realistic physics based gameplay makes for a highly realistic bike racing experience

Perform death defying stunts and try to keep balance on landings
